name: Relic Alone
description: Discover mysterious relics inside an ancient temple and progress through hidden chambers by using the power of strange “cores” to attract relics together. Relic Alone is a game inspired and developed by Roconilo Project, an award-winning student team from HAL Osaka College of Technology and Design.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1 Processor: Intel Core i5-3210M or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound
